title: How to Make Lemonade with One Lemon

steps.headline: Squeeze all the juice out of it that you can.
Pour your juice into a container with 1/4 cup (2 oz) sugar.
Add a very small amount of water to your container.
Stir your solution until sugar dissolves.
Fill up a container with water and add ice.
Put your lemonade in the fridge for five minutes.

tyn: a one pound packet of sugar (2 ounces)
text: Cut your lemon in half.  Squeeze all the juice out of it that you can.  Pour your juice into a container with 1/4 cup (2 oz) sugar.  Add a very small amount of water to your container.  Stir your solution until sugar dissolves.  Fill up a container with water and add ice.  Put your lemonade in the fridge for five minutes.  Serve and enjoy! Serves 2.
